name: Goblin Raid!
description:
Control a bunch of goblins who have joined together to raid a castle, and all their controls are joined to the same buttons!

Made for the GMTK game jam

Use WASD to move

Use R to restart

Get to the flag

Try to keep as many goblins alive as you can per level!

have fun

credits:

Font - Press Start 2P By CodeMan38 found on goolge fonts

Art is all by me

Jump sound from SFXR

Thanks to Techiness for making a great global signal tutorial, as I didn't use them before, and without them, I wouldn't have been able to finish the game

made in Godot game engene

(allso, ignore the glitchy screenshot of tons of goblins, definitly there was not a glitch that summoned hundreds of goblins per frame and crashed, ahahahahaa why would you think that)
